data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 4,063,900 souls living in the county of Raipur with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Raipur, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Raipur, Chhattisgarh, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Raipur to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Raipur against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Gandia people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Raipur access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Raipur, Chhattisgarh, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary:
the county of Raipur, Chhattisgarh, India has a population of 4,063,900.

We estimate Raipur has 44,703 people who might know Jesus, 49,309 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,969,889 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Raipur, Chhattisgarh, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.
